flurry.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a time when there is suddenly a lot of activity and people are very busy
flurry.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: After a quiet spell there was a sudden flurry of phone calls.
The day started with a flurry of activity.
flurry.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a small amount of snow or rain that is blown by the wind
flurry.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He opens the door and a flurry of snow blows in.
